tools.name: resolve-library-id
tools.description: Required first step: Resolves a general package name into a Context7-compatible library ID. Must be called before using 'get-library-docs' to retrieve a valid Context7-compatible library ID.

libraryName.description: Library name to search for and retrieve a Context7-compatible library ID.

tools.name: get-library-docs
tools.description: Fetches up-to-date documentation for a library. You must call 'resolve-library-id' first to obtain the exact Context7-compatible library ID required to use this tool.

context7CompatibleLibraryID.description: Exact Context7-compatible library ID (e.g., 'mongodb/docs', 'vercel/nextjs') retrieved from 'resolve-library-id'.

tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens of documentation to retrieve (default: 5000). Higher values provide more context but consume more tokens.

examples.prompt: How do I use the new Next.js `after` function? use context7
How do I invalidate a query in React Query? use context7
How do I protect a route with NextAuth? use context7
